title: APOLLO 26 :: FLAME N SKULL
content:
Hyperfoundry Apollo 26 announces its second retail release, Flame N Skull, a Mini Design Kit that is instantly downloadable after payment confirmation. Flame N Skull features two fonts from the Typophile forums, Sotoflame and Motorpsycho, and 70 pieces of .eps art. The regular price is $49, but current customers and early birds can get it for $19 for a limited time.   
   
To preview the kit, see our site, [http://www.apollo26.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014140302/http:/www.apollo26.com/)  
   
   
Thanks,   
   
:: the Apollo 26 crew
author: beejay
